name: Purple Fortress
description:
PURPLE FORTRESS

Long ago, the humans defeated the purple ogre. In its fortress, the red and blue ogres were born.

Defend them against the attacks from animals!

You control the red ogre with the [left]/[right] arrow keys.

You control the blue ogre with the [up]/[down] arrow keys.

You can press [R] to reset your position and lose 5HP

ItemDescriptionApplerecover 15 HPGreen Bananalose 10 HPDaggerdeal 1HP damage to enemy Blue/Red Items.

 if an item is blue, only red ogre can activate it.

If an item is red, only blue ogre can activate it.

I REPEAT. You can click on R to reset the ogres' positions Credits
